definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[פקע]] (√ of foll., mng. dub.; NH [[פָּקַע]] split, spring off; cf. Targum Ithpe., Syr. pqa9 burst, crash; NH [[פְּקַעַת]] is ball, roll, [[פְּקִיעַ]] wick, [[הִפְקִיעַ]] denom.; Ar. faqa9a is be yellow, also break wind, II. crack finger-joints, etc.; Sir 46:17 [[פקע]] crash; Targum [[פְּקַע]] roll noisily; Syr. paq9o0 crash, crack).
